name: io.github.Berckan/bugherd-mcp
description: BugHerd integration. Admin MCP server + project worker MCP server.

environmentVariables.description: BugHerd API key from Settings > General Settings
environmentVariables.name: BUGHERD_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: (Project worker) Bot user id for comments
environmentVariables.name: BUGHERD_BOT_USER_ID

environmentVariables.description: (Project worker) Max chars returned for task descriptions
environmentVariables.name: BUGHERD_DESCRIPTION_MAX_CHARS

environmentVariables.description: (Project worker) Optional comma-separated active column ids
environmentVariables.name: BUGHERD_ACTIVE_COLUMN_IDS
